title: Topic 03 Question 30
body: Your company plans to follow DevSecOps best practices of the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure to integrate DevSecOps processes into continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) DevOps pipelines.
You need to recommend which security-related tasks to integrate into each stage of the DevOps pipelines.
What should recommend? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
